text: Hello! If anyone has a minute to help this user handle the use case of using the related posts module when there are no posts pulled in, it would be greatly appreciated! <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Content-Design-Questions/Related-Posts-Module-handle-case-of-no-posts-found/m-p/217389> Al suggestions and tips are welcome!

Im asking Matt Coley for some background on this. I dont think there would ever be an instance that it wouldnt pull back a post. Unless they had a blog that had zero posts in it that they were trying to reference.
